name: EverTomb - 2021 Game Jam
description:
A 2021 48 Hour Game Jam with the Theme "A Classic Reimagined"

Created By:

Jesse Martin

Matt McLaughlin

Dylan Twomley

The three of us created this game with Retro Legend Of Zelda in mind. As we got further into development we found that the game was also reminiscent of the game RuneScape as well.
